channel.title: Terry Weatherbee on Refresh Annapolis Valley
channel.description: Recent content in Terry Weatherbee on Refresh Annapolis Valley

item.title: STEAM Powered! Maker Space / FabLab @AcadiaU
item.description: The recent and explosive growth in maker-culture combined with the emergence of 3D Printing in Fabrication Laboratories (or “FabLabs”) presents an opportunity for the province to prepare for the future by investing in economic and cultural change in rural Nova Scotia. Acting in concert with the Acadia Entrepreneurship Centre and the Centre for Rural Innovation, Acadia’s new STEAM Space is working toward the creation of a Maker Space/FabLab on the Acadia University campus.
